hero.subtitle: Designed for high-concurrency business, providing 1.63µs ultra-low latency and 500,000+ QPS throughput. Built-in visual editor with real-time WASM execution.

benchmarks.title: Benchmark Results
benchmarks.description: Single-thread tests on Apple Silicon (M-series) show Ordo's exceptional performance far exceeding industry standards.
benchmarks.chart_note: * ~600x performance boost, making real-time business decisions invisible.

features.title: Core Features
features.description: Ordo is more than just a rule engine; it's a complete rule life cycle management platform.
features.editor_desc: Dual modes of drag-and-drop Flow and structured Form editing to lower maintenance barriers.
features.performance_desc: Built with Rust, supports millions of QPS with 1.63µs latency, perfect for financial payments.
features.wasm_desc: Preview rules instantly in browser via WebAssembly with execution tracing and debugging.
features.audit_desc: Built-in version management with one-click rollback. Full audit logs for compliance requirements.
features.tenant_desc: Namespace-level rule isolation and per-tenant QPS limits to easily support SaaS business.
features.integration_desc: Provides HTTP REST, gRPC interfaces, and SDKs for Go, Java, Python, and more.
features.usecase_finance_desc: Real-time anti-fraud and credit strategy evaluation with millisecond response to massive requests.
features.usecase_ecommerce_desc: Dynamic coupon issuance and flash sale logic for flexible promotion strategies.
features.usecase_routing_desc: Payment channel selection and dynamic traffic distribution based on real-time data.

code.title: Easy to Define, Seconds to Execute
code.desc: Ordo uses intuitive JSON/YAML formats. Supports rich expression syntax including math, logic, and built-in functions. Get decision results and detailed trace in microseconds via simple API calls.
code.step1_desc: Define step flow and decision logic

editor.title: Intuitive Visual Editor
editor.desc: Design complex decision flows without writing code. Ordo provides a powerful visual editor with real-time preview and debugging.
editor.view_multi_desc: Seamlessly switch between Flow and Form views to fit different editing habits.
editor.view_wasm_desc: Get identical results to server-side execution instantly in browser using WASM.
editor.view_trace_desc: Visually trace every node in rule execution to make debugging effortless.

cta.title: Ready to boost your business decisions?
cta.desc: Join us and experience the revolution of development efficiency with performance and visual editing. Ordo is open sourced on GitHub.

footer.desc: High-performance, minimalist, self-contained Rust rule engine for financial, payment, and high-concurrency business.
